text.name: longdescription
text.text: The Commodore 16 is a home computer made by Commodore International with a 6502-compatible 7501 or 8501 CPU, released in 1984 and intended to be an entry-level computer to replace the VIC-20. CPU MOS Technology 7501/8501 @0.89/1.76MHz, 16KB RAM + 32KB ROM, Graph TED (320×200, 121 colors), Sound TED 2ch. Release date '84.
